definition: the Antarctic Peninsula (jutting out towards South America)

sentences.english: Antarctica is one of the last real wildernesses left on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 南極洲是地球上所剩不多的曠野之一。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一條橫貫南極洲的山脈，從東到西將南極洲分爲兩半。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一條橫貫南極洲的山脈，從東到西將南極洲分爲兩半。

sentences.english: From the above question, why do you consider Antarctica as your tourist destination?
sentences.chinese: 承上題，爲什麼會考慮選擇南極作爲旅遊景點？

sentences.english: I live on all the continents of the world except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 我住在世界上除南極洲以外的所有的陸地上。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 除了南極洲，我住在世界上所有的陸地上。

sentences.english: That dream wizard waved his hands, I saw the scenery of the Antarctic and Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 那個夢精靈雙手一揮，我看到了南極和北極的風光。

sentences.english: The ice shelves currently insulate the Antartic continent from wind.
sentences.chinese: 冰架目前使南極洲和風隔絕。

sentences.english: So together, he and the penguin would row to the south pole.
sentences.chinese: 於是，小男孩決定，他要和小企鵝一起划船到南極去。

sentences.english: Fossil-hunting in Antarctica is extremely difficult.
sentences.chinese: 在南極進行化石搜尋是極度困難的。

sentences.english: Out of the inner parts shall a tempest come, and cold out of the north.
sentences.chinese: 暴風來自南極密宮，嚴寒出自極北之地。

sentences.english: An enormous iceberg nestles into an ice shelf in Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 一座巨大的冰山依偎在南極冰架的懷抱。

sentences.english: Dr Steve Rintoul, the voyage leader, says the survey has revealed changes in the ocean around Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 航行負責人史帝夫說，考察顯示出南極海域的改變。

sentences.english: Japanese whale hunters plan to capture 50 humpback whales in the Antarctic in the coming months.
sentences.chinese: 日本捕鯨者計劃下月在南極捕捉50頭駝背鯨。

sentences.english: In Antarctica, the sun shines 24 hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 在南極，太陽每天照耀24小時。

sentences.english: Oil spills from tourist boats are polluting Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 溢油污染是從南極旅遊船。

definition: the North Pole/the Arctic Pole/the north magnetic pole
Shikoku (one of the four main islands of Japan)
